title: Angela Zhao
text: Angela Zhao is a first year PhD student in Biostatistics at Johns Hopkins University. Her research interests are functional data analysis/time-series modeling with applications to wearable device and imaging data. Hobbies include bouldering, stand-up comedy, and playing classical music (fun fact: she taught piano for 4 years).

title: About
text:
Johns Hopkins University
